blocks.headline: TinaCMS + Gatsby
blocks.text: Utilise the Static Site Generation features of Gatsby with the flexibility of TinaCMS.

blocks.content:
## Why We Like Gatsby

Gatsby is a JAMstack style static site generator â€“ like Tina it's tied to React.

It's known for being well optimized for static data with pre-fetching, server side rendering and other features built-in.

This makes it a common pairing with Headless CMS tools such as Tina. ðŸ¦™

It also has a rich ecosystem of plug-ins available.

## Gatsby + Tina

Tina works best with [NextJS](https://tina.io/nextjs-cms), but if you have an existing Gatsby project or want to take advantage of Gatsby's plug-in library, Tina might still be a good fit.

We have guides on [getting started with Gatsby](https://tina.io/docs/frameworks/gatsby), and also on configuring [an existing Gatsby project to work with Tina](https://tina.io/docs/guides/converting-gatsby-to-tina).

items.headline: Database Free
items.text: Tina uses a "Datalayer" that makes content retrieval efficient (which can be self-hosted!). Behind that, the ultimate source of truth for your content is a familiar one â€“ a GitHub repository that you have total control over.

items.headline: Customizable and Extendable
items.text: TinaCMS allows you to create custom field widgets, add custom validation to fields, and create workflows outside of TinaCMS itself, leveraging Git-based content.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: TinaCMS's open-source frontend means greater flexibility and customization for your projects. Benefit from regular updates and a thriving community.

items.headline: Static Routing
items.text: Whether you're serving your content statically or dynamically, you can configure a Gatsby + TinaCMS project to tailor to your needs.

items.headline: MDX Support
items.text:
With TinaCMS, you can register your MDX components and provide a UI for them.

We call this "Block Based Editing" â€“ a similar approach to other mainline CMS tools.

items.headline: Visual Editing
items.text: Experience the ease of TinaCMS's visual editing features, designed to make content management more intuitive and efficient.
